alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 09 at 3:55AM HST until January 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .The combination of a moderate size, medium period northwest (320 deg) and north -northwest (350 deg) swell both building through today will increase surf heights to advisory levels. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf up to 18 to 22 feet along north facing shores and up to 12 to 16 feet along west facing shores.. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
